17  package com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.internal.storage.repository.cache;
18  
19  import static com.google.common.base.MoreObjects.toStringHelper;
20  import static com.linecorp.centraldogma.internal.Util.unsafeCast;
21  import static com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.internal.api.HttpApiUtil.throwUnsafelyIfNonNull;
22  import static com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.storage.repository.FindOptions.FIND_ONE_WITH_CONTENT;
23  import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
24  
25  import java.util.List;
26  import java.util.Map;
27  import java.util.concurrent.CancellationException;
28  import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
29  import java.util.concurrent.Executor;
30  
31  import com.linecorp.armeria.common.CommonPools;
32  import com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext;
33  import com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.Exceptions;
34  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.Author;
35  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.Change;
36  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.Commit;
37  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.Entry;
38  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.EntryNotFoundException;
39  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.Markup;
40  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.MergeQuery;
41  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.MergedEntry;
42  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.Query;
43  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.QueryType;
44  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.Revision;
45  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.common.RevisionRange;
46  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.command.CommitResult;
47  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.internal.storage.repository.RepositoryCache;
48  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.storage.project.Project;
49  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.storage.repository.DiffResultType;
50  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.storage.repository.FindOption;
51  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.storage.repository.Repository;
52  import com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.storage.repository.RepositoryListener;
53  
54  final class CachingRepository implements Repository {
55  
56      private static final CancellationException CANCELLATION_EXCEPTION =
57              Exceptions.clearTrace(new CancellationException("watch cancelled by caller"));
58  
59      private final Repository repo;
60      private final RepositoryCache cache;
61  
62      CachingRepository(Repository repo, RepositoryCache cache) {
63          this.repo = requireNonNull(repo, "repo");
64          this.cache = requireNonNull(cache, "cache");
65      }
66  
67      @Override
68      public org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository jGitRepository() {
69          return repo.jGitRepository();
70      }
71  
72      @Override
73      public long creationTimeMillis() {
74          return repo.creationTimeMillis();
75      }
76  
77      @Override
78      public Author author() {
79          return repo.author();
80      }
81  
82      @Override
83      public <T> CompletableFuture<Entry<T>> getOrNull(Revision revision, Query<T> query) {
84          requireNonNull(revision, "revision");
85          requireNonNull(query, "query");
86  
87          final Revision normalizedRevision = normalizeNow(revision);
88          if (query.type() == QueryType.IDENTITY || query.type() == QueryType.IDENTITY_TEXT ||
89              query.type() == QueryType.IDENTITY_JSON) {
90              // If the query is an IDENTITY type, call find() so that the caches are reused in one place when
91              // calls getOrNull(), find() and mergeFiles().
92              final String path = query.path();
93              final CompletableFuture<Entry<?>> future =
94                      find(revision, path, FIND_ONE_WITH_CONTENT).thenApply(findResult -> findResult.get(path));
95              return unsafeCast(future);
96          }
97  
98          final CompletableFuture<Object> future =
99                  cache.get(new CacheableQueryCall(repo, normalizedRevision, query))
100                      .handleAsync((result, cause) -> {
101                          throwUnsafelyIfNonNull(cause);
102                          return result != CacheableQueryCall.EMPTY ? result : null;
103                      }, executor());
104         return unsafeCast(future);
105     }
106 
107     @Override
108     public CompletableFuture<Map<String, Entry<?>>> find(Revision revision, String pathPattern,
109                                                          Map<FindOption<?>, ?> options) {
110         requireNonNull(revision, "revision");
111         requireNonNull(pathPattern, "pathPattern");
112         requireNonNull(options, "options");
113 
114         final Revision normalizedRevision = normalizeNow(revision);
115         return cache.get(new CacheableFindCall(repo, normalizedRevision, pathPattern, options))
116                     .handleAsync((unused, cause) -> {
117                         throwUnsafelyIfNonNull(cause);
118                         return unused;
119                     }, executor());
120     }
121 
122     @Override
123     public CompletableFuture<List<Commit>> history(Revision from, Revision to,
124                                                    String pathPattern, int maxCommits) {
125         requireNonNull(from, "from");
126         requireNonNull(to, "to");
127         requireNonNull(pathPattern, "pathPattern");
128         if (maxCommits <= 0) {
129             throw new IllegalArgumentException("maxCommits: " + maxCommits + " (expected: > 0)");
130         }
131 
132         final RevisionRange range = normalizeNow(from, to);
133 
134         // Make sure maxCommits do not exceed its theoretical limit to increase the chance of cache hit.
135         // e.g. when from = 2 and to = 4, the same result should be yielded when maxCommits >= 3.
136         final int actualMaxCommits = Math.min(
137                 maxCommits, Math.abs(range.from().major() - range.to().major()) + 1);
138         return cache.get(new CacheableHistoryCall(repo, range.from(), range.to(),
139                                                   pathPattern, actualMaxCommits))
140                     .handleAsync((unused, cause) -> {
141                         throwUnsafelyIfNonNull(cause);
142                         return unused;
143                     }, executor());
144     }
145 
146     @Override
147     public CompletableFuture<Change<?>> diff(Revision from, Revision to, Query<?> query) {
148         requireNonNull(from, "from");
149         requireNonNull(to, "to");
150         requireNonNull(query, "query");
151 
152         final RevisionRange range = normalizeNow(from, to).toAscending();
153         return cache.get(new CacheableSingleDiffCall(repo, range.from(), range.to(), query))
154                     .handleAsync((unused, cause) -> {
155                         throwUnsafelyIfNonNull(cause);
156                         return unused;
157                     }, executor());
158     }
159 
160     @Override
161     public CompletableFuture<Map<String, Change<?>>> diff(Revision from, Revision to, String pathPattern,
162                                                           DiffResultType diffResultType) {
163         requireNonNull(from, "from");
164         requireNonNull(to, "to");
165         requireNonNull(pathPattern, "pathPattern");
166         requireNonNull(diffResultType, "diffResultType");
167 
168         final RevisionRange range = normalizeNow(from, to).toAscending();
169         return cache.get(new CacheableMultiDiffCall(repo, range.from(), range.to(),
170                                                     pathPattern, diffResultType))
171                     .handleAsync((unused, cause) -> {
172                         throwUnsafelyIfNonNull(cause);
173                         return unused;
174                     }, executor());
175     }
176 
177     @Override
178     public CompletableFuture<Revision> findLatestRevision(Revision lastKnownRevision, String pathPattern,
179                                                           boolean errorOnEntryNotFound) {
180         requireNonNull(lastKnownRevision, "lastKnownRevision");
181         requireNonNull(pathPattern, "pathPattern");
182 
183         final RevisionRange range = normalizeNow(lastKnownRevision, Revision.HEAD);
184         if (range.from().equals(range.to())) {
185             // Empty range.
186             return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(null);
187         }
188 
189         return cache.get(new CacheableFindLatestRevCall(repo, range.from(), range.to(),
190                                                         pathPattern, errorOnEntryNotFound))
191                     .handleAsync((result, cause) -> {
192                         throwUnsafelyIfNonNull(cause);
193                         if (result == CacheableFindLatestRevCall.ENTRY_NOT_FOUND) {
194                             throw new EntryNotFoundException(range.from(), pathPattern);
195                         }
196                         if (result == CacheableFindLatestRevCall.EMPTY) {
197                             return null;
198                         }
199                         return result;
200                     }, executor());
201     }
202 
203     @Override
204     public CompletableFuture<Revision> watch(Revision lastKnownRevision, String pathPattern,
205                                              boolean errorOnEntryNotFound) {
206         requireNonNull(lastKnownRevision, "lastKnownRevision");
207         requireNonNull(pathPattern, "pathPattern");
208 
209         final CompletableFuture<Revision> latestRevFuture =
210                 findLatestRevision(lastKnownRevision, pathPattern, errorOnEntryNotFound);
211         if (latestRevFuture.isCompletedExceptionally() || latestRevFuture.getNow(null) != null) {
212             return latestRevFuture;
213         }
214 
215         final CompletableFuture<Revision> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
216         latestRevFuture.whenComplete((latestRevision, cause) -> {
217             if (cause != null) {
218                 future.completeExceptionally(cause);
219                 return;
220             }
221 
222             if (latestRevision != null) {
223                 future.complete(latestRevision);
224                 return;
225             }
226 
227             // Propagate the state of 'watchFuture' to 'future'.
228             final CompletableFuture<Revision> watchFuture =
229                     repo.watch(lastKnownRevision, pathPattern, errorOnEntryNotFound);
230             watchFuture.whenComplete((watchResult, watchCause) -> {
231                 if (watchCause == null) {
232                     future.complete(watchResult);
233                 } else {
234                     future.completeExceptionally(watchCause);
235                 }
236             });
237 
238             // Cancel the 'watchFuture' if 'future' is complete. 'future' is complete on the following cases:
239             //
240             // 1) The state of 'watchFuture' has been propagated to 'future' by the callback we registered
241             //    above. In this case, 'watchFuture.completeExceptionally()' call below has no effect because
242             //    'watchFuture' is complete already.
243             //
244             // 2) A user completed 'future' by his or her own, most often for cancellation.
245             //    'watchFuture' will be completed by 'watchFuture.completeExceptionally()' below.
246             //    The callback we registered to 'watchFuture' above will have no effect because 'future' is
247             //    complete already.
248 
249             future.whenComplete(
250                     (unused1, unused2) -> watchFuture.completeExceptionally(CANCELLATION_EXCEPTION));
251         });
252 
253         return future;
254     }
255 
256     @Override
257     public <T> CompletableFuture<MergedEntry<T>> mergeFiles(Revision revision, MergeQuery<T> query) {
258         requireNonNull(revision, "revision");
259         requireNonNull(query, "query");
260 
261         final Revision normalizedRevision = normalizeNow(revision);
262         final CacheableMergeQueryCall key = new CacheableMergeQueryCall(repo, normalizedRevision, query);
263         final CompletableFuture<MergedEntry<?>> value = cache.getIfPresent(key);
264         if (value != null) {
265             return unsafeCast(value.handleAsync((unused, cause) -> {
266                 throwUnsafelyIfNonNull(cause);
267                 return unused;
268             }, executor()));
269         }
270 
271         return Repository.super.mergeFiles(normalizedRevision, query).thenApply(mergedEntry -> {
272             key.computedValue(mergedEntry);
273             cache.get(key);
274             return mergedEntry;
275         });
276     }
277 
278     @Override
279     public void addListener(RepositoryListener listener) {
280         repo.addListener(listener);
281     }
282 
283     @Override
284     public void removeListener(RepositoryListener listener) {
285         repo.removeListener(listener);
286     }
287 
288     private static Executor executor() {
289         return RequestContext.mapCurrent(RequestContext::eventLoop, CommonPools.workerGroup()::next);
290     }
291 
292     // Simple delegations
293 
294     @Override
295     public Project parent() {
296         return repo.parent();
297     }
298 
299     @Override
300     public String name() {
301         return repo.name();
302     }
303 
304     @Override
305     public Revision normalizeNow(Revision revision) {
306         return repo.normalizeNow(revision);
307     }
308 
309     @Override
310     public RevisionRange normalizeNow(Revision from, Revision to) {
311         return repo.normalizeNow(from, to);
312     }
313 
314     @Override
315     public CompletableFuture<Map<String, Change<?>>> previewDiff(Revision baseRevision,
316                                                                  Iterable<Change<?>> changes) {
317         requireNonNull(baseRevision, "baseRevision");
318         return repo.previewDiff(baseRevision, changes);
319     }
320 
321     @Override
322     public CompletableFuture<CommitResult> commit(Revision baseRevision, long commitTimeMillis,
323                                                   Author author, String summary, String detail, Markup markup,
324                                                   Iterable<Change<?>> changes, boolean normalizing) {
325 
326         return repo.commit(baseRevision, commitTimeMillis, author, summary, detail, markup, changes,
327                            normalizing);
328     }
329 
330     @Override
331     public String toString() {
332         return toStringHelper(this)
333                 .add("repo", repo)
334                 .toString();
335     }
336 }
